item.title: UI Actions
item.description: Links CTA Link Launch â†— .cta-link { position: relative; display: inline-block; color: #333; padding: 10px 30px 10px 0; border-bottom: 2px solid; font-family: 'Open Sans', Helvetica Neue, sans-serif; font-size: 17px; text-align: left; text-decoration: none; box-sizing: border-box; } .cta-link:hover, .cta-link:focus { text-decoration: none; } .icon-arrow { position: absolute; top: 30%; right: 0; width: 16px; height: 16px; transition: right .2s; } .cta-link:hover .icon-arrow, .cta-link:focus .icon-arrow { right: -5px; } Learn web development (function() { var root = document.
